All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ally
A class that represents the Ally.
Altar
A class that inherits from Ground.
Animal
An abstract class that represents the type of Enemy that can attack the Player.
Application
The main class to start the game.
AreaAttackAction
A class that represents an Area Attack which attacks all Actors surrounding the Actor attacking.
Astrologer
A class representing the Astrologer Class, giving the player 396 staring HP and a GreatKnife as their starting weapon.
AttackAction
An Action to attack another Actor.
AttackBehaviour
A behaviour that determines what type of Attack Action should be performed and on who by the Actor.
AxeOfGodrick
A class AxeOfGodrick that inherits from TradeableWeapon.
Bandit
A class representing the Bandit Class, giving the player 414 staring HP and a GreatKnife as their starting weapon.
Barrack
A class that inherits from SpawnableGround, in which it spawns the Animal type Enemy.
Behaviour
Created by:
BossRoom
A class representing the Boss Room Map.
Buyable
A Buyable interface.
BuyingAction
A class that represents a Buying Action.
Cage
A class that inherits from SpawnableGround, in which it spawns the Animal type Enemy.
Classes
An abstract class representing all the Classes the Player can choose, giving unique staring HP, weapon and skills.
Cliff
A class that represents bare dirt.
Club
A class Club that inherits from TradeableWeapon.
Consumable
A Consumable interface.
ConsumeAction
A class that represents a Consume Action when the Player consumes a Consumable Item.
DeathAction
An Action executed if an Actor is killed.
Despawnable
A Despawnable interface that enforces a .despawn() method for despawning Actors.
DespawnAction
A class that represents a Despawning Action in which a Despawnable will despawn.
Dirt
A class that represents bare dirt.
Dog
A class that represents the Dog.
DogTeeth
A class DogTeeth that inherits from WeaponItem and is utilised by the Dog.
EastSpawningFactory
A class that is used as a Factory to spawn certain actors on the East side of the map.
Enemy
An abstract class that represents the Enemy that can attack the Player.
EnemyStatus
Use this enum class to give capabilities for Enemy.
FallingAction
An Action executed if an Actor fall and died.
FancyMessage
Fancy messages used to print the game title Font obtained from: https://patorjk.com/software/taag/#p=display&f=Georgia11&t= Font: Georgia11 Created by:
FingerReaderEnia
A class that represents the Finger Reader Enia Trader.
FlaskOfCrimsonTears
A class FlaskOfCrimsonTears that inherits from abstract class.
Floor
A class that represents the Floor inside a building.
FollowBehaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
GiantCrab
A class that represents the Giant Crab.
GiantCrabPincer
A class GiantCrabPincer that inherits from WeaponItem and is utilised by the GiantCrab.
GiantCrayfish
A class that represents the Giant Crayfish.
GiantCrayfishPincer
A class GiantCrayfishPincer that inherits from WeaponItem and is utilised by the GiantCrayfish.
GiantDog
A class that represents the Giant Dog.
GiantDogHead
A class GiantDogHead that inherits from WeaponItem and is utilised by the GiantDog.
GodrickSoldier
A class that represents the GodrickSoldier.
GodrickTheGrafted
A class that represents the Boss - Godrick the Grafted.
GoldenFogDoor
GoldenFogDoor which inherits from Ground and implements Travelable as it can be used "travel" to other GameMaps.
GoldenRunes
A class GoldenRunes that inherits from Item abstract class.
GraftedDragon
A class GraftedDragon that inherits from TradeableWeapon.
Graveyard
A class that inherits from SpawnableGround, in which it spawns the Undead type Enemy.
GreatKnife
A class GreatKnife that inherits from TradeableWeapon and is wielded by the Player.
Grossmesser
A class Grossmesser that inherits from TradeableWeapon and is wielded by the Heavy Skeletal Swordsman.
GroundStatus
Use this enum class to give capabilities for Ground.
GustOfWind
A class that inherits from SpawnableGround, in which it spawns the Animal type Enemy.
HeavySkeletalSwordsman
A class that represents the Heavy Skeletal Swordsman.
Interactable
A Interactable interface that enforces a .interact() method for things that allow Player to interact with other Interactables.
InteractAction
A class that represents an Interact Action when the Player activates a Site of Lost Grace.
Invader
A class that represents the Invader.
ItemStatus
Use this enum class to give capabilities for items.
Limgrave
A class representing the Limgrave Map.
LoneWolf
A class that represents the Lone Wolf.
LoneWolfTeeth
A class LoneWolfTeeth that inherits from WeaponItem and is utilised by the LoneWolf.
MapDisplay
A Class contain the Display Strings of all GameMaps.
MapManager
A Map Manager class which manages the switching of GameMaps and the Golden Fog Doors used to travel in between them.
Maps
An abstract class representing the creation of a Maps instance for new Maps.
Marine
An abstract class that represents the type of Enemy that can attack the Player.
MerchantKale
A class that represents the Merchant Kale Trader.
PileOfBones
A class that represents the Pile of Bones the Undead turn into.
Player
Class representing the Player.
PuddleOfWater
A class that inherits from SpawnableGround, in which it spawns the Marine type Enemy.
Quickstep
A class that represents a unique Skill "Quickstep" performed when using the Great Knife.
QuickStepAction
A class that represents a Quick Step Action.
RandomNumberGenerator
A random number generator Created by:
RecoverRunesAction
A class that represents a Recovering Runes Action when the Player recovers the dropped Runes after they have died.
RemembranceOfTheGrafted
A class RemembranceOfTheGrafted that inherits from Item abstract class.
ResetAction
A class that represents a Reseting Action when the Player dies.
ResetManager
A reset manager class that manages a list of resettables.
Resettable
A Resettable interface.
RestAction
A class that represents a Resting Action when the Player rests on the Site of Lost Grace.
RoundtableHold
A class representing the Roundtable Hold Map.
RuneManager
A RuneManager class which modifies and manages the Runes.
Runes
A class Runes that inherits from Item abstract class.
SacredTears
A class SacredTears that inherits from abstract class.
Samurai
A class representing the Samurai Class, giving the player 455 staring HP and a Uchigatana as their starting weapon.
Scimitar
A class Scimitar that inherits from TradeableWeapon and is wielded by the Player.
Sellable
A Sellable interface.
SellingAction
A class that represents a Selling Action.
SiteOfLostGrace
A class that inherits from Ground.
SkeletalBandit
A class that represents the Skeletal Bandit.
Skills
An abstract class that represents all Skills that can be used by an Actor.
SlamAttack
A class that represents a SpecialAttackAction that slams, attack hits anything in their surroundings including other enemies of the same type within the attack area.
Spawnable
A Spawnable interface that enforces a .spawn() method for spawning Actors.
SpawnableGround
An abstract class that represents a Ground that can spawn Enemies.
SpawningFactory
An interface which allows the spawning of different Enemies on different side of the GameMap.
SpecialAttackAction
A class that represents a Special Attack Action.
SpinAttack
A class that represents a SpecialAttackAction that spins and attacks all Enemies around the attacking Actor, including other enemies of the same type.
Status
Use this enum class to give general capabilities.
StormveilCastle
A class representing the Stormveil Castle Map.
StormveilEnemy
An abstract class that represents the type of Enemy that can attack the Player.
SummonSign
A class that inherits from SpawnableGround, in which it spawns the Allies/Invaders.
ThirdChurchOfMarika
A class representing the Third Church of Marika Map.
TradeableWeapon
Am abstract class that represents all Tradeable Weapons in Elden Ring which inherits from WeaponItem.
Trader
A class that represents the Trader.
Travelable
A Travelable interface that enforces a .travel() method for things that allow Player to travel to different Game Maps.
TravelMapAction
A class that represents a Special Attack Action.
Uchigatana
A class Uchigatana that inherits from TradeableWeapon and is wielded by the Player.
Undead
An abstract class that represents the type of Enemy that can attack the Player.
Unsheathe
A class that represents a unique Skill "Unsheathe" performed when using the Uchigatana.
Utils
This class contains generic helper functions used in the program.
Wall
A class that represents the Wall.
WanderBehaviour
Class WanderBehaviour that implements Behaviour interface.
WeaponStatus
Use this enum class to give capabilities for Weapons.
WestSpawningFactory
A class that is used as a Factory to spawn certain actors on the West side of the map.
Wretch
A class representing the Wretch Class, giving the player 414 staring HP and a Club as their starting weapon.
